original_title: Strawberry Shortcake: Jammin with Cherry Jam
overview: The glow of friendship shines brighter than the spotlight when Strawberry and her pals meet superstar Cherry Jam!  Get ready for a rockin' good time as the girls face stage fright, work to impress a talent scout and consider moving to Berry Big City.  Along the way, they learn that fame and fortune can be fun, but there's nothing more important than friendship.
title: Strawberry Shortcake: Jammin with Cherry Jam
